Requires leveling up the branch to %1$s %2$s for use.
Select toggle mode: 'Purchase' to acquire the skill.
Select toggle mode: 'Upgrade' to improve the skill.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.gui.help: To obtain SkillPoints, you need SkillXp, which can be acquired by mining ores or gaining experience from Relics. Additionally, skill experience can be gained by killing mobs. The skill experience bar at the bottom indicates how much SkillXp is left to collect until the next SkillPoint.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_1: With a 3% chance for each mined block using a pickaxe, allows obtaining an additional random unprocessed ore.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_2: Allows mining blocks in a 3x1 radius using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_3: With a 2% chance for each mined block using a pickaxe, can regenerate 1 heart.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_4: Attracts all dropped resources to the player immediately when using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_5: Increases the chance of dropping valuable ores when using a pickaxe.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_6: With a 2% chance for each skill level when using a shovel, grants a short-term speed effect.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_7: With a 0.4% chance for each mined block using a shovel, obtain a random item from a treasure chest.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_9: When using a pickaxe in the off-hand, accelerates block mining with a 15% chance.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.m_skill_1: With a 10% chance, applies invisibility when mining blocks with a pickaxe.
Expands the capabilities of the pickaxe, allowing the mining of blocks in a 3x3 radius.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_1: With a 0.5% chance, ignites the enemy upon a successful attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_2: Allows shooting from a bow and crossbow without the need for arrows.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_3: Upon a successful attack, increases damage and stuns enemies for a certain duration.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_4: With a 1% chance per level, creates an explosion dealing damage to the surrounding area.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_5: With a 0.5% chance per level, creates magical stones around the player upon a successful attack, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_6: With a 0.4% chance, 1 Soul is dropped from a killed creature.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_7: With a 2% chance per level, allows attacking nearby enemies upon a strike.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_8: With a 10% chance per level, restores half a heart to the player upon an attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_9: Increases the chance to deal critical damage upon a successful attack.
tooltip.arcane_abilities.skill.f_skill_1: Allows the player to instantly dash towards an enemy in the direction of the crosshair when [Right Mouse Button] is pressed.
Allows the player to temporarily increase defense, reducing incoming damage.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.description:
+1 experience point for each use of the 'Directional Glow' ability. 
+1 experience point for every 50 blocks teleported to the 'Beacon Mark'.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.compa: Creates a pointer that will point to the nearest structure, the type of which depends on the color of the pointer.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.set_b: Sets a teleportation point for the 'Instant Return' ability. Only works in the Overworld.
tooltip.relics.fate_beacon.ability.insta: Teleports you back to the set 'Beacon Mark' point.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.descriptio:
+1 experience point for each use of the 'Light Beam' ability. 
+5 experience points for changing day to night using the 'Time Magic' ability.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.du: Grants the wearer complete invisibility and increases movement speed when the light level is sufficiently low.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.li: Turns darkness around you into a dazzling light, illuminating all hostile mobs in the radius.
tooltip.relics.shadow_lantern.ability.ti: Instantly changes the time of day to the opposite. If it's currently day, it becomes night, but not vice versa.
tooltip.relics.stellar_sphere.descriptio:
+1 experience point for each use of the 'Celestial Ascension' skill. 
+4 experience points for using the 'Starfall' ability.
tooltip.relics.stellar_sphere.ability.st: Surrounds you with light that illuminates the area around. Enemies caught in this light are blinded.
Lifts you into the air using star energy, providing you with temporary flight. The flying ability does not work in 'Creative' mode.
Summons a shower of sparkling stars that damage enemies within the radius and heal the player.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.description:
+2 experience points for each use of the 'Snowy Whirlwind' ability.
+1 experience point for using the 'Icy Projectiles' ability.
+2 experience points for using the 'Frosty Shackles' ability.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.snowy: Creates a vortex of snowflakes around you, dealing icy damage to enemies in the radius and knocking them back.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.frost: Envelops the player in frost, freezing them in place for a short duration.
tooltip.relics.icy_crystal.ability.icy_p: Fires icy projectiles from the 'Icy Crystal,' dealing damage to enemies in front.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.descripti:
+1 experience point for each use of 'Parachute Descent' skill. 
 +1 experience point for each entity killed by 'Air Strike' skill.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.ability.p: Upon activation, turns falling into a smooth descent.
tooltip.relics.weightless_boot.ability.a: Upon landing, creates an air strike, damaging nearby entities.
